snippet: Emanuel Ax was the soloist with the Orchestra of St. Luke’s on Sunday at the Caramoor festival.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews Orchestra of St Luke's performance, conducted by Pablo Heras-Casado and featuring the soloist Emanuel Ax, as part of the Caramoor International Music Festival.
lead_paragraph: Emanuel Ax was the soloist with the Orchestra of St. Luke’s on Sunday at the Caramoor festival.

headline.seo: Emanuel Ax and Orchestra of St. Luke’s at Caramoor
headline.main: Impromptu Duet for Beethoven and Mother Nature
headline.print_headline: Impromptu Duet for Beethoven and Mother Nature
